FuncDef: The reset radius-client statistics command clears statistics about RADIUS packets exchanged between a RADIUS client and RADIUS proxy.
CLIs: reset radius-client statistics [ client-ip <client-ip-address> [ [ mask { <mask-ip> | <mask-length> } ] | [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] ] * ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of a RADIUS client.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the mask of a RADIUS client.
-

Specifies the IP address mask of a RADIUS client.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the IP address mask length of a RADIUS client.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 32.

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To collect statistics about RADIUS packets exchanged between a RADIUS client and RADIUS proxy in a coming period, run the reset radius-client statistics command to clear the existing statistics.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
